subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tom Dumoulin passed this year’s Tour de France winner, Chris Froome, with about 50 yards left in a steep climb to win the ninth stage.
snippet: Tom Dumoulin passed this year’s Tour de France winner, Chris Froome, with about 50 yards left in a steep climb to win the ninth stage.
